property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {YOBINION} (When you summon this creature, you may reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a creature that costs less than this one. Put that creature. Shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your turn, untap this creature. ■ Varavariety 3: At the end of each turn, untap all your creatures. (If you have 3 or more elements that have different costs, this creature gets this ability.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) {HYPER ENERGY} (As you summon this creature, you may tap any number of your creatures that have different costs. For each creature you tapped in this way, this creature costs 2 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature taps, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, that creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand, one into your graveyard and the other on the top of your deck. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Add one to your hand, one into your graveyard and the other on the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Realitel, Illusionary Elemental / "This Memory Is Also Locked!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can only attack you or your creatures once per turn. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a civilization. Tap all creatures that have that same civilization. You and your creatures can't be chosen by spells that have that civilization until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules1
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent can only attack you or your creatures once per turn.

property.name: Rules2
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose a civilization. Tap all creatures that have that same civilization. You and your creatures can't be chosen by spells that have that civilization until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, each player chooses one of their creatures and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon may cost 1 less. It can't cost less than 1. When you put that creature into the battle zone, it gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.
